mapper.insert: insert into hd_admin (name, username, password, encrypt_password, enabled, create_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{encryptPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, now())
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,m.id as menuid,m.name as menuname,m.component,m.parentid from hd_admin a LEFT JOIN hd_admin_menu am on am.aid = a.id LEFT JOIN hd_menu m on m.id = am.mid where a.id = #{id}

SELECT m.id, m.name, m.component, m.parentid, subm.id as subid, subm.name as subname, subm.component as subcomponent, subm.parentid as subparentid from hd_menu m LEFT JOIN hd_menu subm on subm.parentId = m.id
